name: Magnet Mania (Vhergo, Dylacus, lgarci78)
description:
In a world ruled by robots, the premier entertainment source is "Magnet Mania", an arena where contestants can play an ELECTRIFYING game to win rewards. You must work together with your partner to destroy as many pucks as possible. "Good luck, and BOO BAP BEEP BEEW"!

The Blue Player uses WASD to move.

The Red Player uses ARROW KEYS to move.

Pucks of the same charge are attracted to you.

Pucks of the opposite charge are repelled by you.

Score Points by pushing/pulling together pucks of the opposite charge.

IF A PUCK OF THE OPPOSITE CHARGE TOUCHES YOU, YOU LOSE!

- Magnet Mania Management
